data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio de Mazatlan have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 8, Goal! Mazatlan have got their heads in front thanks to a Cesar Huerta strike.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente's Jordi Cortizo has been booked in Mazatlan.
In the minute 21, Jorge Aguilar (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a first yellow card.
He's off! Jorge Aguilar is shown a second yellow card.
In the minute 38, Mazatlan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tijuana de Caliente.
Cesar Huerta (Mazatlan) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Estadio de Mazatlan, Fabian Castillo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio de Mazatlan.
The second-half is underway at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Pablo Guede is making the team's second substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Marcel Ruiz replacing Jordi Cortizo.
In the minute 46, Luis Mendoza is replacing Cesar Huerta for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Kevin Balanta is on a sub for Christian Rivera for Tijuana de Caliente.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Miguel Sansores is booked for the home team.
In the minute 56, Mazatlan make their first substitution with Fernando Aristeguieta replacing Miguel Sansores.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Edgar Lopez with David Barbona.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
Efrain Velarde (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team replace Luis Mendoza with Manuel Perez.
In the minute 82, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
